column1: #Text=Tu , you 're the best cousin that I can have .
#Text=" Yin says : " It 's such a shame you two must leave so soon .
#Text=" Mako says : " I wished we could stay .
#Text=But if it 's true the Earth Queen is forcing airbenders into her army , we have to do something about it .
#Text=" Yin says : " I love you both .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I love you too , Grandma .
#Text=And Chow , and Tu , and Meng - Meng , and Chow Jr. , there is Big Tee and Little Tee , and Medium Yu , and ... and ... and what was your name again ?
